faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Real Estate Agents and Investing in Sohna Road Gurugram
faqSection.description: Get clear concise answers to the most common queries regarding property investment potential and the services offered by expert real estate agents along the Sohna Road corridor.

faqs.question: What is the typical commission charged by real estate agents in Sohna Road Gurugram
faqs.answer: The commission structure often varies depending on the type of property and the nature of the transaction sale purchase or lease. Generally for outright sales residential agents charge a percentage typically 1 to 2 percent of the total sale consideration from each party the buyer and the seller. For rental transactions it is usually equivalent to one month's rent. Always clarify the exact commission structure with your chosen Sohna Road real estate agent before formal engagement to ensure complete transparency.

faqs.question: How can I verify the RERA registration status of a property and an agent on Sohna Road
faqs.answer: Verifying RERA compliance is crucial for safe investment. You should check the official Haryana RERA website HRERA where all registered projects and authorized real estate agents must be listed. Ensure the project registration number is valid and cross-reference the agentâ€™s unique RERA ID. A reputable real estate agent in Sohna Road will always provide their RERA registration details upfront without prompting.

faqs.question: Is Sohna Road considered a good long-term investment location for residential property
faqs.answer: Absolutely Sohna Road is recognized as one of the fastest-appreciating corridors in the NCR due to its strategic location and planned infrastructure upgrades. Key drivers include excellent connectivity to Golf Course Extension Road the proximity of major corporate hubs and the direct access provided by the Delhi-Mumbai Expressway. Long-term appreciation prospects for both plots and high-rise apartments remain strong.

faqs.question: What documentation should I check when buying a plot through an agent in Sohna Road
faqs.answer: When purchasing a plot in Sohna Road, especially in sectors approved under schemes like DDJAY, critical documents include the title deed possession certificate mutation records and the approved building plan if applicable. Your real estate agent must facilitate due diligence on the Khatauni documents and ensure there are no pending encumbrances or legal disputes against the land parcel before you commit to the purchase.

faqs.question: How do I ensure the real estate agent I hire is reputable and trustworthy
faqs.answer: Trust is built through transparency and verifiable credentials. Look for agents with extensive experience specifically in the Sohna Road market proven track record demonstrated by successful closures and strong client testimonials. Additionally confirming their RERA registration and professional affiliations helps ensure they operate ethically and professionally.

faqs.answer: Property prices for 3BHK apartments in premium sectors like 68 and 70 along Sohna Road exhibit a wide range based on the builder amenities and stage of construction new or resale. faqs.question: Do real estate agents assist with securing home loans for Sohna Road properties
faqs.answer: Yes highly professional Real Estate Agents in Sohna Road often maintain strong relationships with leading banks and financial institutions. They can facilitate the home loan application process connect you with preferred lenders and help you gather the necessary documentation speeding up the approval time for your Sohna Road property purchase.

faqs.question: What are the key differences between investing near Badshahpur and closer to Sohna town on Sohna Road
faqs.answer: The main difference lies in maturity and pricing. Areas closer to Badshahpur and the main Gurgaon city are generally more developed higher priced and offer immediate connectivity. Areas near Sohna town are currently undergoing rapid development providing better entry points for high-yield long-term capital appreciation but may have fewer immediate social infrastructure amenities.

faqs.question: Can I authorize my real estate agent to act on my behalf through a Power of Attorney POA for transactions
faqs.answer: Yes this is common especially for NRI clients or those with limited availability. You can grant a General Power of Attorney GPA or Special Power of Attorney SPA to your agent or a trusted legal representative to execute specific tasks like signing papers or attending registration. Ensure the POA is legally drafted stamped and registered to avoid future legal complications.

faqs.question: What are the ongoing major infrastructure projects that will impact property values on Sohna Road
faqs.answer: The most significant project is the completion of the Delhi-Mumbai Expressway which provides direct access and drastically reduces travel time enhancing commercial viability. Other impactful projects include the proposed metro extension connectivity plans and improvements to sector roads ensuring smoother traffic flow boosting desirability and subsequently property values along Sohna Road.
